name: 3.5.3.1. Elemental Planes
content:
@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.XOJpjqmBzwE4R4n0]{(Index) Environment}

@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.ryIRK7CjUk9fI8TT]{3.5. The Planes}

  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.9ZxtJSapPINNjxbT]{3.5.3. Inner Planes}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.BtNqgktOkZENzN1c]{3.5.3.1. Elemental Planes}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.EQFsfwmMHxeX34rq]{3.5.3.2. Energy Planes}

Source PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 440

The four classic Inner Planes are the Plane of Air, the Plane of Earth, the Plane of Fire, and the Plane of Water—it is from these planes that the creatures known as elementals hail, yet they house many other strange denizens as well, such as the genie races, strange metal-eating xorns, unseen invisible stalkers, and mischievous mephits.
